means: 琼脂（一种植物胶，用海产石花菜类制成，可作冷食或微生物的培养基等），石花菜

word_mean: 〔NF〕琼脂，洋粉：从胶石花菜(Gelidium cartilagineum)细水绵(Gra-cilaria confervoides)及有关红藻(red algae)中提取的一种粘性物质。在100℃时熔化，40℃时固化成凝胶。不能被大部分细菌所消化，故用作微生物的固体培养基的凝胶，增容性轻泻剂，制备乳剂，以及免疫扩散和免疫电泳时的支持性基质
又称“琼胶”、“冻粉”。从石花菜、江蓠、紫菜等红藻中提取的多糖类胶质。

sentence.Network_en: Agar is complex polysaccharide, extracted from red algae.
sentence.Network_cn: 琼脂是一种从红藻中提取的复杂的多糖.

sentence.Network_en: The virulent strains had a polysaccharide capsule and formed smooth colonies on agar medium.
sentence.Network_cn: 有毒菌株具有多糖荚膜它在琼脂培养基上形成光滑的菌落.

sentence.Network_en: Various overlay mediums , such as agar , starchgel, methyl cellulose and tragacanth are used.
sentence.Network_cn: 常用的覆盖培养基有:琼脂 、 淀粉凝胶甲基纤维素和黄蓍胶等.

琼脂平板(Agar Plate)是一种把消毒后的培养基加上繁殖微生物所需材料(通常是洋菜及养分)后制成的有盖培养皿。由于提供了微生物繁殖的有利条件,琼脂平板能够用来.
...养成分。它是配制特殊培养基的基础，也可作为一般培养基用。如营养肉汤（nutrient broth）、营养琼脂（nutrient agar）、蛋白胨水等。

encyclopedia.content: Agar is a mixture of a neutral, dominating polysaccharide called "Agarose" and a charged polymer called "Agaropectin". The agarose is composed of (1-4) linked 3,6-anhydro -a- - L - galactose alternating with (1-3) linked - b - D - galactose. MingQiong Brand---Agar is a natural macromolecule multi_sugar product,which extracted from porphyra and Gracilaria etc seaweeds as raw mat

means.word_mean: 1. any culture medium that uses agar as the gelling agent
2. a colloidal extract of algae; used especially in culture media and as a gelling agent in foods
